Àtụ:Infobox ethnonym
Kpwe (Mokpwe) bụ asụsụ Bantu nke Cameroon
Ya na Kole na-aghọta ya nke oma, ma eleghị anya na Mboko (Wumboko) nwekwara nghọta.
Enwere ọtụtụ ụdị nke aha ahụ: dabere na 'Kpwe' (Bakpwe, Mokpwe), na 'Kpe' (Mokpe), na ' Kweɾi' (Kwedi, Kweli, Kwili, Kwiri, Bakwedi, Bakwele, Bakweri, Vakweli, Bekwiri), yana Ujuwa, Vambeng.
